game.title: Dragon's Breath
game.objective: Defeat the Dragon and collect its breath
game.description: As per the King's order, venture into the dark forests, seek the mighty dragon in its lair, defeat it, and bring back its breath. Use caution and strategy, for the dragon is fierce and relentless.

task.description: Search for clues in the Dark Harvest Forest to locate the dragon's lair.
Engage the dragon in a fierce battle at its lair, maintain strong defences and target its vulnerable spots.
After defeating the dragon, acquire its breath in the magical urn provided by the King.
